name: Heartbeast's 1-Bit Godot Course: 2) Piggy
description:
Part Two of Heartbeast's 1-Bit Godot course found here: https://heartbeast-gamedev-school.teachable.com/p/1-bit-godot-course-by-heartbeast

Course includes 4 projects of increasing complexity with the first two teaching some very basic beginner concepts; in this case, player movement, collisions, and feedback on screen. You can see my course progression through the project here:

Heartbeast's 1-Bit Course Projects

  1. Rocket Launch - Complete
  2. Piggy - Complete
  3. Space Shooter - In Progress
  4. Metrodvania - Pending

Github Repository: https://github.com/xvcrimsajadevx/Godot-Projects/tree/main/1-Bit%20Course%20-%20...

Further Development: Maybe. May go side-scrolling platformer?

Bonus Heartbeast content here: Heartbeast's Action RPG Tutorial
